text: A Thai Characters English Name is a Transliteration
A thai character does not have an official name in English. The reason is that it is more or less impossible to, or at least very debated, convert thai into english.
Instead, the thai is transliterated into english.
Let’s look at a few examples to better illustrate this.

Here we have one of the most common thai characters in existance. In some words it will sounds more like a ‘k’, in others like a ‘g’. As there is no rule for when it sounds like what, picking a true english version becomes impossible.
For this specific character, you will therefore see its name as many different variations.

ก ไก่ - ko kai
ก ไก่ - go gai
ก ไก่ - gaw gai
And to re-iterate, all of these are equally correct when written in english. The only 100% true name for the character is when it is written with thai characters themselves.
